title: Soraka is such an ironic champ...
body: Banana themed, yet has no peel...

replies.body: A banana won't peel itself tho. It requires something else to peel it. Just like Soraka.
jk I bought {{item:3022}}

{{item:3116}} ???

http://i.imgur.com/Vp51SkC.jpg

Tell me, are soraka's bananas abilities?

NO >:C
her abilities r infused with bananas ill have u know

Hey, i just thought of a buff for Soraka that should be accurate to her theme and still be a nice quality of life change:

Soraka's banana auto attacks are peeled bananas. But the peel is discarded at her feet, 5 peels can be on the ground and each lasts 2 minutes (they function like Cait and Nida traps).
When an opponent steps on a peel, they get Dazed 4 seconds. Daze means the movement commands are reversed (Bananas are weird like that).
When an ally steps on a peel, they get 1000% mS buff + a free trip to the Fountain.

#RITO HIRE ME
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

Yeah but that made me giggle a bit though. :)
Other than replying to posts like these, can you guys address some of the issues that many summoners are expressing?(i.e. Dynamic Queue, balance, etc.)

Right- just in case you don't know why you're downvoted (it can happen) it's because a Red isn't necessarily anyone involved with game design. Actually if you highlight their name it outright tells you what they do.

Also it's something of a faux pas to tell people off for enjoying a small joke in any case. Riot knows about the other threads. They will deal with them when and how they see fit.
I must wonder why Phreak never posts on the boards despite all of these threads.
Not sure if troll...
I hope he is, because he's also wrong about the grammer. The OP got it right.
His post history shows that he is in fact a troll. I was hoping he was just the latter half of the unfinished sentence.

Assuming you're serious, "is" would be the correct choice because there's only 1 soraka. What you might be thinking of would be "Soraka players (plural) are ironic"

Then again, what does grammar have to do with an argument anyways?
She is such a banana that she IS the peel. She peels by getting the opponent to attack her instead.
Someone give this man a ~~Cookie~~  Banana
She's got a slow and an AOE silence/root. I wouldn't say she lacks peel.

Her silence can easily be walked and her Q can be dodged pretty easily...

Take Janna, thresh, and alistar, they have multiple displacement/disengage skills. 
Soraka has peel, but it is sivirly lacking compared to real "peel" supports .3.
Well aren't her heals considered peel? It prevents you from killing her ADC after all

No? Well to you maybe? But to me heals are considered heals not peel. (basically would you consider the summoner spell "Heal" and peel skill?) Also if the enemy all ins you it is almost impossible to constantly heal your ADC at earlier levels because of the heals cool down.


For me peels is the ability keep the enemy off your teammate for long periods of time. Soraka doesn't offer this, that is why she works well with ADCs who can win long trades, graves *coughs*.
.
Heal does have a movement speed buff, so it can aid in peeling in ways other than healing.

True.
I dunno i just have a hard time peeling for my ADC when I play Raka, and they usually die when they try to all in the enemy :I like my heal is on cd bruh!
Other ppl may see that she has peel, but i personally don't really enjoy rakas "peel" LOL
how is your heal on CD, it has like a 1-4 second CD lol
Answered your own question :)

f she hits a q, she gets a mov speed that she can transfer to ally, its really easy to hit a q when enemy is chasing you, even her slow helps a bit

Edit: fk somebody already answered that
Perhaps Soraka has something new... PEALS!!!!!

Technically, peel is getting dangers off of your ADC/APC, like they are the banana and they are the... peel, Janna does this exceptionally well (Q and W slow them down, E protects when they do get on/near the carry, R gets them off and heals everyone)

> [{quoted}](name=Choaru,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UkgEUsxg,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-03-30T16:57:22.002+0000)
>
> Her silence can easily be walked and her Q can be dodged pretty easily...

They're ground-targeted. That means that if she puts them between you and your target, and you dodge...you just got peeled anyway, unless you flashed through, and oh yeah, that's an AoE silence, so good luck with that. Besides, her Q is only easy to dodge at max range. If she Q's you point blank and drops an E on her feet, you're not chasing.
Who needs to peel when you cast a permanent {{champion:10}} ult on an ally of your choice?
{{champion:26}} mine's still a zillean times better

No peel? Not to ruin the joke, but if she places her E right, she can guarantee the root on anyone who's chasing, especially now that her Q slows all targets. And if they turn to walk around it, well, congrats, they're peeled.
